itemInfo.itemDesc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.
